name: Ohm's Odyssey
description:
Spark your way through the arcs of Assence,

- Tap to way up and down

- Charge the arc in way to earn points.

- enter the portals to evolve into various power sources.

******************************
GAME FEATURES
******************************
✓ Beautiful HD Game Graphics
✓ Super easy game controls
✓ Interesting game to keep you engaged
✓ Play and beat your own high score
✓ Unlock new powerups
✓ Quick & Challenging Gameplay
✓ Improves Concentration
✓ Low app size and offline playing feature
✓ Free to play
✓ Sound effects with ability to mute



If you want to play an easy game to improve your concentration and relax a while, you must try Ohm's Odyssey - Electric Arc Bounce Challenge which is free to play. Download the free game now to get started.
